description: Try our easy to follow Cornflake Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cornflake Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place on trays, leaving space between each for spreading. Bake for 1215 minutes or until golden. Cool on trays for 10 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely. Keep in an airtight container for up to 3 days.
